author: By JULIET LINDERMAN and MARTHA MENDOZA Associated Press
title: Key medical glove factories cutting staff 50% amid virus
description: Malaysia's medical glove factories, which make most of the world's critical hand protection, are operating at half capacity just when they're most needed, The Associated Press has learned.
content:
Malaysia's medical glove factories, which make most of the world's critical hand protection, are operating at half capacity just when they're most needed, The Associated Press has learned.
